fields.name: Lead Generation
fields.description: Targeted lead generation services through digital ads, events, and referral networks to bring high-quality prospects for automobile dealerships.

fields.name: Increase Customer Base
fields.description: Strategies to expand dealership reach through digital platforms, partnerships, and customer referral programs to acquire new customers effectively.

fields.name: Customer Retention
fields.description: Loyalty programs, after-sales service improvements, and personalized communication plans designed to increase customer satisfaction and repeat business.

fields.name: Privilege Offer Distribution in Open Markets
fields.description: Designing and distributing exclusive privilege offers, discount vouchers, and promotional campaigns in open markets to attract new buyers and maintain visibility.
